# forge cache ls

Shows cached data from the global foundry directory

```bash
$ forge cache ls --help
```

```txt
Usage: forge cache ls [CHAINS]...

Arguments:
  [CHAINS]...
          The chains to list the cache for.
          
          Can also be "all" to list all chains.
          
          [env: CHAIN=]
          [default: all]

Options:
  -h, --help
          Print help (see a summary with '-h')
```
